mapper.select: SELECT b.brdid, b.frid, b.title, CASE WHEN b.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, a.nickname as writer, b.count, b.likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_freeboard_reply c WHERE c.brdid = b.brdid) as repcount FROM brd_freeboard b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno ORDER BY b.brdid DESC LIMIT #{skiprow}, #{pagerow}

SELECT b.brdid, b.frid, b.title, DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as regdate, b.content, a.nickname as writer, b.userno, b.count, b.likes, b.dislikes
FROM brd_freeboard b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno WHERE b.brdid = #{brdid}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO brd_freeboard( frid, title, regdate, moddate, content, userno ) VALUES( #{frid}, #{title}, NOW(), NOW(), #{content}, #{userno} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO brd_freeboard_reply( brdid, content, regdate, moddate, userno )VALUES( #{brdid}, #{repContent}, NOW(), NOW(), #{userno} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_freeboard_reply WHERE brdid = #{brdid}

SELECT a.repid, b.nickname as replier, a.content as repContent, DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as repRegdate, a.likes as repLikes, a.dislikes as repDislikes FROM brd_freeboard_reply a LEFT JOIN info_userinfo b on a.userno = b.userno WHERE a.brdid = #{brdid}
mapper.update: UPDATE brd_freeboard SET content = #{content}, title = #{title}, moddate = NOW() WHERE brdid = #{brdid}
